name: The Low Road
description: Lie, blackmail, and steal your way down The Low Road. Rookie agent Noomi Kovacs must navigate her way through the world of corporate espionage in this dark spy comedy set in the 1970s.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0GHz dualcore Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 Compatible Video Card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: Embedded Additional Notes: 16:9 monitor recommended
